Class SaleItem

java.lang.Object
  SaleItem

public class SaleItem
extends java.lang.Object

Class: SaleItem Description: This class sets the fields and instance variables for the application. It then calculates the discount price and tax of each item given to it by the driver class.

Version:
(Version 1.0 September 21, 2014)
Author:
Raymond Ferrell

Constructor Detail

SaleItem

public SaleItem(double TAX_RATE)
This constructor sets all of the initial fields to zero.

Parameters:
TAX_RATE: - a constant used to calculate tax

SaleItem

public SaleItem(double priceOfItem,
                double discountPrice)
This constructor calls the methods needed to change the field and variable values

Parameters:
priceOfItem: - the original price of the item
discountPrice: - The item's price after the discount is calculated
Method Detail

calcDiscountPrice

public double calcDiscountPrice(double priceOfItem,
                                double discountPercent)
This method calculates the discount price.

Parameters:
priceOfItem: - the original price of the item
discountPercent: - The percentage of the original price that equals the discount price.
Returns:
discountPrice: The item's price after the discount is calculated (will equal original price if discountPercent is zero)

calcTax

public double calcTax(double discountPrice)
This method calculates the tax.

Parameters:
discountPrice: - The item's price after the discount is calculated
Returns:
tax: The tax of the item.

setDiscountPercent

public void setDiscountPercent(double discountPrice,
                               double discountPercent)
This method calls the method needed to calculate the tax.

Parameters:
discountPrice: - The item's price after the discount is calculated
discountPercent: - The percentage of the original price that equals the discount price.

setPriceOfItem

public void setPriceOfItem(double priceOfItem)
This method calls the method needed to calculate the price after the discount is entered.

Parameters:
priceOfItem: - the original price of the item
